Articles.Content: I don't get a crash, so there's no logs, but sometimes when I load anything from vessel view, the screen is mostly black except the cursor and the loading icon in the corner. It also starts playing the music/sounds for whatever I loaded as if it had loaded it correctly. This happens when reverting a launch, going to space center, going to tracking station, and even loading a save; all of these occur when going to these from any vessel view.
